articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Verstappen credits "tow buddy" Hulkenberg for help to grab Imola F1 pole - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen says "tow buddy" Nico Hulkenberg played a part in the Red Bull driver grabbing pole for Formula 1's Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
articles.content: Verstappen and Red Bull had appeared on the back foot in Imola all weekend, but after turning around their car set-up, Verstappen came up with a big lap when it mattered and held off McLaren duo Osca… [+1899 chars]
